description: Frontend Developer specialized in modern frameworks like React, Vue.js and integration with Node.js and Laravel backends. I focus on creating dynamic and scalable web applications with cutting-edge technologies.
availableDesc: I currently accept freelance projects and job opportunities in remote or hybrid mode.

contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together to make it happen!
project_1_description: Conexus Hub is a comprehensive educational platform designed to facilitate communication and management within the educational center. The project connects students, teachers, administrative/technical staff, and cafeteria services in a single modern and intuitive web platform.
project_2_description: High Link is an exciting cooperative platform game where two players must work together to ascend through different levels. United by an elastic rope, each player controls a character with unique abilities, requiring precise coordination to overcome challenges.
project_3_description: Chromatic Bond is a web game created with Phaser.js, challenging players to combine colors to progress through increasingly complex levels. With vibrant graphics and addictive gameplay, this project showcases my skills in game development and interactive design.
experience_1_desc_1: Development of web applications with React and Node.js
experience_1_desc_2: Implementation of RESTful APIs and microservices
experience_1_desc_3: Collaboration in agile teams using Scrum methodologies
experience_2_desc_1: Development of responsive user interfaces with Vue.js
experience_2_desc_2: Performance optimization and user experience enhancement
experience_2_desc_3: Integration with APIs and third-party services

experience_4_title: Higher Degree in Multiplatform App Development (DAM)
